Одна из лучших игр того времени, когда игровая индустрия всё ещё бурно развивалась, радуя нас неожиданными сюрпризами. Поистине шикарное произведение. Увлекательный сеттинг.
Как и многие, я не оставляю надежд дождаться HL3 при жизни. Ну а пока - поностальгирую в Black Mesa. Благо, что её разработчики постарались на славу.

Quien no le trae nostalgia este juego....Desde que salió en el 2004, nos dejo con la boca abierta, un excelente juego.
-El juego usa el motor Source, y para el año en que salió, nos sorprendio bastante.
-Un buen Soundtrack.
-La inteligencia artificial es muy buena (el año en que salió este juego también nos dejo con la boca abierta).
-Gráficos excelentes (Apesar de que el motor Source se esta volviendo viejo, aún me sorprende).
-Las físicas del juego son buenas. (También nos dejo con la boca abierta)
-La mecánica del juego es buena.
-Muy buenos personajes (Oh por Dios...Es Gordon Freeman o.o)
-La historia del juego es buena.
Apesar de que ya no saldra el Half-Life 3, este juego seguirá en nuestros corazones incluyendo los mejores momentos. Siempre te recordaremos Gordon Freeman :´(

I still consider this one of the "Manliest" games I've ever played. I got this game when it first came out on Pc Disc & I was blown away from the graphics & mechanics the game offered. In my opinion, no other game compared to Half-Life 2 in the early 2000's. I spent a few hundred hours playing this as a teenager & I had to get it on Steam because of RESPECT! RESPECT! Instant classic in my book, I just wish that a Half-Life 3 was made...
If you havn't played this game already, then please go die.

Half life 2 Is undoutedly one of my favorite video game stories, The game has it's fair share of both shooting and storytelling so be prepared for some exploring alongside the action, This was also the first half life game I ever played - and despite this It left just enough backstory to keep me guessing as to what happened in past events ( Being half-life 1 ) and how things came to be.

Overall I love this game It has a Beautiful soundtrack, engaging Combat, and a lengthy story that will keep you guessing.

This game needs another squel. What else can a man say? The game would be even better if it continued in a 3rd game called Half Life 3™ that continues off the cliffhanger of Half life 2™: Episode 2. That would be great, thank Valve. 

Your Loyal customer, Andy.
Give us the 3

Easily the best single player FPS ever made. Never has a game done so much for the gaming industry as this. Without this there would be no steam Pc gaming wouldn't be as popular, all source games wouldn't exist and so many other FPS's that it inspired. Truly a masterpiece.

Лучшая игра от VALVE! Сюжет мне понравился. Да иногда есть нестыковки , но где их нет? Графон даже сейчас хорош , а если модов скачать, то еще лучше. Геймплей к концу надоедает , но он все время разбавляется новыми фишками. Оптимизация на высоте. Также после прохождения, можно пройти много фанатских модов. Игра хороша, это нельзя отрицать.Жалко, что третьей части скорее всего не будет.
Легендарная игра, что тут ещё сказать.

I can't believe that I haven't reviewed this. Even despite being on the bandwagon for Half-life 3.

This game isn't the best in the graphics department, but it has the story. It's more pure to the FPS genre than the Deus Ex (which diverges genre-wise), but the Half-life story is still engaging.

Physics puzzles are rife, and rightly so. The protagonist is a scientist! With a geniune science crowbar. (Cite: Bad Guys webtoon.)

If you haven't heard of this series, then welcome to Earth, please enjoy your stay. And unless you're from Zen, you'll probably like this game.

... if you're from Zen, then maybe skip this series.

I give this a 15 out of 10 science crowbars.

Best FPS game ever made. Proved that you did not need cinematics in a game to tell a story, that letting the environment tell you the story. It is a very well aged game and for those who have not picked it up yet, do it!!!

looking back at my old reviews, how the heck did I think this was the best game? I give it a 8/10. Great story, great variety and pacing, kinda bad gunplay. But I enjoyed it. I'd recommend if you like shooters, but you might want mmod if you want the shooting to feel good.
